Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Stargazer
Reviews.Content: I have one camera like this all inside parts work great depending what you want to focus in on other reviews well they must have gotten a bad lense. night vision was great this camera lit up an alley way of 200 ft plus great camera Im buying 2 more like this one Joe L

Reviews.Title: Didn't Work
Reviews.Author: M. Wood "odds10to1"
Reviews.Content: Camera didn't zoom. Had to open the housing and remove camera to set zoom & focus all with-out breaking or unattatching the short wires connecting the camera to the processor board. Complicated. Couldn't get neither the zoom or focus to move up - down or in - out.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E imager, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor
700 TV lines high resolution. NTSC system
Weatherproof housing. IP66. Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Build-in 65 Infrared LEDs. 8~20mm Varifocal lens
Package included: 2 of SONY CCD cameras, 2 of power supplies and 2 of security warning Decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Pack 700TVL High Resolution Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E DSP Outdoor Home Security Cameras Day Night Vision 65 IR Leds 8-20mm 3X Zoom Lens for CCTV DVR Surveillance System with Free Power Supplies CNX
